name: 黃馨瑩
objective: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
schedule:
Week	Content
1	Orientation
2	Unit 1—Brains and Gender: Reading
3	Unit 1: Reading / Listening
4	Unit 1: Writing
5	Unit 2—Pricing: Listening
6	Unit 2: Reading / Listening
7	Unit 2: Speaking
8	Review
9	Midterm exam and Proficiency Test
10	Unit 3—Conformity: Reading
11	Unit 3: Reading / Listening
12	Unit 3: Writing
13	Unit 4—Aesthetics: Listening
14	Unit 4: Reading / Listening
15	Unit 4: Reading / Listening
16	Unit 4: Speaking
17	Review
18	Final Exam and Proficiency Test
scorePolicy:
1. Daily Performance: 30%
(a) Check-in Quiz - 10%
(b) Homework and Assignment - 10%
(c) Your attendance and participation - 10%
2. Course Project and Review Exam: 40%
3. Campus-wide Proficiency Test: 30% (期中&期末會考各15%)
